name: Revivify
description: Revive slugcat and slugpup corpses, in co-op or not! Lay your friend flat on a solid floor and rhythmically tap GRAB twice per second to resuscitate them. Returning from death's door is an ordeal, so take care of them afterwards.<LINE><LINE>Configurable. Art by twitter.com/GarbageWastes and code at github.com/Dual-Iron/revivify
